alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 3:42PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central White Pine and southern Elko Counties through 430 PM PDT... At 341 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 17 miles southeast of Ruby Lake, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Big Bald Mountain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; White Pine County
